channel.title: Game crashes after exiting game
channel.description: I recently tried to play the game and when I exited it stayed in a black screen and there was no way for me to get to my desktop. I had to turn off my computer and login again and I did this multiple times to see if it was only once.

item.title: Game crashes after exiting game
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
It’s alway helpful to post your system specs when reporting a crash or asking for help, etc.

The fix for Windows 10 is to put this in the launch options:
-window -noborder

You can also save the game progress, alt-tab out and close bms.exe in the task manager. But that’s not
very elegant.
